=================
### Radiological Services Tender Opportunity

#### Tender Information

* Tender Reference Number: `cb-6683-26610211`
* Solicitation Number: `21401-26-4379567`
* Publication Date: `2023-06-23`
* Tender Closing Date: `2023-07-21T14:00:00`
* Amendment Date: `2023-07-21`

#### Tender Summary

The Correctional Service Canada invites eligible suppliers to provide radiological services to male offenders residing in federal institutions in the Ontario region. The services must be delivered by a registered medical doctor in the province of Ontario, licensed to practice with the College of Physicians and Surgeons of Ontario.

#### Services Required

Radiological services include:

* Reading and interpreting X-rays and ultrasound reports for designated sites
* Completing reports for radiological services
* Providing 7-day coverage, 365 days a year, from 0800 to 1700 hours, with most services occurring Monday to Friday.

#### Eligibility and Evaluation

Eligible suppliers must be able to demonstrate their ability to provide high-quality radiological services to meet the Correctional Service Canada's requirements. Suppliers will be evaluated based on their:

* Technical capabilities to provide radiological services
* Pricing
* Experience delivering similar services

#### Contract Duration and Renewal

The contract period is October 1, 2023, to September 30, 2025. There is an option to renew for three additional one-year periods.

#### Contact Information

* Danielle Murdoch, Procurement Officer
* Phone: (343) 422-4831
* Email: [danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the statement of work and basis of payment, are available for download from the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6683/rfp---4379567---radiological-analysis-services---en.pdf) website.
